text: Lauren Collins (born 1980, Wilmington, North Carolina, United States) is an American journalist who has been a staff writer at The New Yorker since 2008. She is the author of When in French: Love in a Second Language (2016). Since 2010, Collins has been based in Europe, covering stories for the New Yorker from London, Paris, Copenhagen, and other capitals. She is fluent in French. == References == == External links == * Lauren Collins at The New Yorker Category:1980 births Category:People from Wilmington, North Carolina Category:American women journalists Category:The New Yorker staff writers Category:Living people
title: Lauren Collins (journalist)
